reviewText: This movie describes the story of the whaling ship the Essex. It describes the real life drama that initated Herman Melvin writing his book: Moby Dick. The movie tells the story of a whaling ship called the Essex that set sail for looking for sperm whales. One whale turned on its attackers and sunk their ship. The movie describes the ordeal they went through trying to surivive. My father owned this movie where I experienced the wonder of their voyage. A must see.
